content.raw:
previously the [ign-cmake pull request](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/21) was only needed for windows, but it looks like it is needed for the other distros as well

* pipeline fails with ign-cmake default f2397cd
* pipeline passes with a47bc95

@mxgrey is there a way for Linux and mac to work with ign-cmake 0.3 or do we need those new changes?
